alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Grant (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 05 at 3:42PM CST by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Clayton, central Grant and southern Crawford Counties through 430 PM CST... At 337 PM CST, trained weather spotters reported a strong thunderstorm near Elkader, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Garnavillo around 350 PM CST. Bloomington around 400 PM CST. Boscobel around 415 PM CST. Other locations impacted by this storm include Mederville, Eastman, Highway 61 And County T, Giard, Turkey River, Beetown, Bixby State Park, Highway 13 And County C 24, County Roads K And T and Fairview. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
